name: Circuit Training
description: A full-body workout alternating between strength and cardio-based exercises.

cards.title: Bodyweight HIIT Circuit
cards.description: A circuit combining strength and cardio exercises in rapid succession.
bulletpoints: Perform squats, push-ups, lunges, and mountain climbers
Work for 45 seconds per exercise, rest for 15 seconds
Repeat for 3-4 rounds depending on fitness level

cards.title: Kettlebell HIIT Routine
cards.description: Incorporating kettlebell exercises into high-intensity circuits.
bulletpoints: Combine swings, goblet squats, and high pulls
Use 30-second work intervals with 15 seconds of rest
Maintain proper form and controlled breathing
